mapper.select: Select count(*) from salary_account where fintech_use_num = #{fintech_use_num}
mapper.update: Update salary_account set category=#{category}, interest=#{interest}, maturity=#{maturity}, expected_amt=#{expected_amt} where fintech_use_num=#{fintech_use_num}
mapper.insert: Insert into salary_account (fintech_use_num, category, interest, maturity, expected_amt) values (#{fintech_use_num}, #{category}, #{interest}, #{maturity}, #{expected_amt})
